```{r load packages}
library(phytools)
library(psych)
library(GPArotation)
library(corpcor)
library(ape)
library(brms)
library(geiger)
library(mice)
library(tidyverse)
library(reshape2)
library(ggridges)
library(bayesplot)
library(hexbin)
```

```{r load data}
df <- read.csv("~/Desktop/Menstrual taboos/R CODE DATA FILES (USE)/Master's data set.csv", header=TRUE)
rownames(df) <- df$tip.label
```

```{r impute}
imputed_data <- mice(df, method="sample")
full_data <- complete(imputed_data)
```

```{r save cleaned}
saveRDS(full_data, "~/Desktop/Menstrual taboos/R CODE DATA FILES (USE)/full_data.rds")
```
